data.text: @DrAliSKhan https://t.co/zby1gm1I0F  (bullet point 11) putting upper level UVGI in schools and public spaces has been shown to stop the spread of TB and the cdc suggests that the tech could work quite well

@DrAliSKhan Yeah somehow antivaxers cannot understand that if 100% of population is vaccinated an vaccine efficacy is lower than 100% (for example 99.99%) then you'll end up with 100% of vaccinated deaths.
@DrAliSKhan The math is pretty simple and yet the people who doubt what Dr. Khan is saying want you to miss that.
